pageContext._xxxcollectionOwnerNamextxt: Iowa Women's Archives at the University of Iowa Libraries, University of Iowa
pageContext._xxxcollectionDescriptionxtxt: Papers primarily document Stirlen's life work as a radio minister on KFNF and KMA, Shenandoah, IA, including over three decades of transcripts of sermons. Also includes the prayers and announcements she read on the radio during her program, printed prayer pamphlets, postcards, calendars and copies of the magazine she sent out to keep in touch with her listeners.
